reviewText: It would not play in my blue ray player.

I didn't get to see this show when it originally aired on Showtime, but bought it on a friend recommendation. This show is Fabulous, Supernatural, Intriguing, Suspense, and a Horror story rolled up into one. After I viewed the first episode I was hooked. I wish I could have seen Penny Dreadful when it originally aired. And Sad that the show was canceled before I could enjoy this magnificent tv show. At least it's on DVD so I can binge watch it over and over again my favorite episodes.
